examples.title: Top stories on Hacker News
examples.body: Fetch the top three news (as ranked by points) on Hacker News front page (https://news.ycombinator.com/front). Read their content. Provide a summary of each news in a markdown file document.

examples.title: Send an email
examples.body: Send an email to laurent@eschenauer.be, tell him how awesome OpenGPA is.

examples.title: Generate an Podcast of the Top News
examples.body: Look at the top news on https://www.bbc.com/news/world and generate a news style podcast with a news brief summary.
